targets.expr: ((sum by(code, protocol, method, service) (rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace",instance=~"$instance",service=~"$service",code=~"(4|5).."}[$__rate_interval]))) / (sum by(code, protocol, method, service) (rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace",instance=~"$instance",service=~"$service",code=~"(4|5).."}[$__rate_interval])))) > (0)
